column1: :Njan ee polytechnic il onnum poyittillallo. Athukondee yanthrathinte pravarthanem onnum enikku nishchayilla.
:Thanaranennu thanikku ariyanmelankil than ennodu chodikku thannaranennu
:thanikku njan paranju tharam thannaranennu ennittu njanaranennu
:But why.... the coefficient of linear expansion is the position of haemoglobin in the atmosphere...... but why
:Nadi kolathilekku chadukayanallo..... camera um oppam chadette
:Entha? Penkuttikalkkinganey simple dress dharikkunna purushanmarey ishtamalley? Don’t they like?
:Go away stupidddddd. In this house of my wife and daughter..... you will not see any minute of the today.
:Theerumbo theerumbo pani tharan.... njan nda kuppinu vanna bhootha
